select c.college_id as collegeId, c.college_name as collegeName, c.school_id as schoolId, c.dean, s.school_name as schoolName, s.school_address as schoolAddress from college c left join school s on c.school_id = s.school_id where c.is_del = true
and c.college_name like '%${collegeName}%'
and c.dean like '%${dean}%'

select c.college_id as collegeId, c.college_name as collegeName, c.school_id as schoolId, c.dean, s.school_name as schoolName, s.school_address as schoolAddress from college c left join school s on c.school_id = s.school_id where c.college_id = #{collegeId}
